rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: An open and spacious living room facing the courtyard for natural light and ventilation, incorporating Vastu principles of auspicious directions.

rooms.name: Home Office
rooms.description: A dedicated home office with sufficient natural lighting and minimal distractions, positioned away from noisy areas while maintaining connectivity to the central space.

rooms.name: Kitchen

rooms.name: Guest Bathroom
rooms.description: A well-appointed guest bathroom for convenience, placed near the living area for easy access during entertaining guests.
